overview: When Tracey Adams buys a rundown phone sex service in Germany, she turns the INTERNATIONAL PHONE SEX GIRLS into a cum-drenched success. Tracey's girls do anything to please a client. From lesbian and sex-toy antics to tongue-licking fun, the phone lines are burning. Super businesswoman Tracey has created a gold mine. When the former owners try to con her out of the business, she screws them before they can screw her. It's sizzling, carnal capitalism at its finest!
title: International Phone Sex Girls
